definitions.definition: A pharmacological substance which decreases neuronal or physiological activity .
examples: Alcohol acts first as a stimulant and then as a depressant .

definitions.definition: An agent that inhibits the flotation of a mineral or minerals.

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) A pharmacological substance which decreases neuronal or physiological activity .
secondary_definitions: ( mining ) An agent that inhibits the flotation of a mineral or minerals.
